VNx+BQ.en:
[Vava]
Hello Friend!
My name is Vava.
As you can see, I am a magican.
I might not look like one but I am the
Royal Summoner's newest pupil!..
I came here to learn the secret of the Summoning Arts.
Unfortunately I am still newbie and there are so many more to learn.

btx+BQ.en:
[Lulu]
Hi there!
Pretty nice weather today huh? Lululala~
I’m Lulu, Vava’s assistant.
The Royal Summoner sent me so I can write down some Scrolls for Vava.
You know, he is really small, and his fingers
can’t write scroll as well as I do.
So I need to assist him.

b9x+BQ.en:
[Lulu]
I am so helpful you know. kikiki..
If you wish, I can write some Scrolls for you too.
To write down the scrolls, you have to bring me some items
that have the essence of the monsters.
But not any monster. You'll have bring the ones I tell you.
Do you want to know which ones?

c9x+BQ.en:
[Lulu]
Bring me item called 'Spawn'. 
Bring me 10 'Spawns' and I'll make
1 'Monster Scroll' for you.
If you bring 500 of them, I think I can
make 1 'MVP Monster Scroll'.
Depend on your ability, your reqirement could be changed.
It won't be too easy but I am sure you can do this. Right?
